articles.description: What is delta-8 THC? Is delta-8 THC from marijuana dangerous? Delta-8 THC is legal thanks to a loophole in the 2018 farm bill. It is a psychoactive compound from marijuana that causes a high.
articles.content: Nickolas Jarosh started smoking marijuana after his shifts as a 911 dispatcher. Hed flip between working days and nights, and the inconsistent schedule made it difficult to fall asleep. Tetrahydrocan… [+8347 chars]

articles.author: Mark Kane
articles.title: 2021 Pikes Peak: Tesla Model S Plaid Wins Its Class, 10th Overall - InsideEVs
articles.description: The race-modified Tesla Model S Plaid, driven by racing driver Randy Pobst, has won the Exhibition class of the 2021 Pikes Peak International Hill Climb race.
articles.content: The Tesla Model S Plaid, race-modified by Unplugged Performance and driven by racing driver Randy Pobst, has won the Exhibition class of the 2021 Pikes Peak International Hill Climb race on June 27, … [+1230 chars]
